name: Korean Tech Doc
description: Converts Korean meeting transcripts into English technical documentation with actionable tickets for developers.

sections.title: Feature Summary
sections.instruction: Summarize the requested feature or change in 1-2 sentences in English. Be specific about what the stakeholders want.

sections.title: Requirements
sections.instruction: List all functional requirements extracted from the discussion. Each requirement should be clear and testable.

sections.title: Acceptance Criteria
sections.instruction: Write acceptance criteria in Given/When/Then format. These define when the feature is considered complete.

sections.title: Open Questions
sections.instruction: List any ambiguities, unclear requirements, or items that need stakeholder clarification before development can proceed.

sections.title: Technical Considerations
sections.instruction: Note any technical constraints, API changes, database schema impacts, or architectural decisions mentioned or implied.

sections.title: Suggested Tickets
sections.instruction: Extract actionable development tickets. For each ticket provide: title, description, and priority (urgent/high/medium/low). Format as a table.

sections.title: Out of Scope
sections.instruction: List any features or requests that were explicitly marked as out of scope or 'nice to have' for later.

sections.title: Verbatim Quotes
sections.instruction: Include important direct quotes from stakeholders in Korean with English translation. These serve as reference for future disputes.
